title: ACCOUNTING
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes including Economics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any other Social Science subject

title: ACTUARIAL SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Economics and Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and Economics plus any other two (2)            relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and one (1) other subject.

title: AGRICULTURE
de_requirements: Candidates must have at least 2 credit passes in Advance level or its equivalents in Chemistry and Biology plus Five SSC (or its equivalent) credit pass prescribed for UTME entry mode. Diploma Holders with a minimum of Lower Credit plus Five SSC (or its equivalent) credit pass Level at a maximum of two sittings are eligible for consideration for admission into 200- and 300- levels, respectively.
utme_requirements: In addition to UTME score, the candidate should possess five credit passes in Senior Secondary Certificate (SSC) to include English Language, Mathematics, Biology or Agricultural Science, Chemistry and Physics in not more than two sittings.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture and any one of Physics or Mathematics.

title: ARCHITECTURE
de_requirements:
(i)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Mathematics or Physics and Chemistry, Geography or Fine Arts.

ND/HND upper credits in relevant field.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any of Fine Art, Geography or Wood Work, Biology, Economics, Technical Drawing, Further. Mathematics., Introduction to Building Construction, Bricklaying/Block laying, Concreting, Wall, Floors and Ceiling Finishing, Joinery, Carpentary, Decorative Painting, Lining, Sign and Design, Wall Hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing, Ceramics, Graphics Design, Graphic Printing, Basic Electricity.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics, and any of Chemistry, Geography, Art, Biology and Economics.

title: BANKING & FINANCE
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2)'A' Level passes in Accounting or Economics and one other subject.

(ii) NCE merit in relevant subjects.

(iii) ND credit.
(iv) Foundation International exam such as ICAN, ACCA, ICMA, GPFA.
utme_requirements:
Five (5)SSC credit passes including
English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, one Social Science subject and any other subject

title: BIOCHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.

 

NCE/ND/HND in related programmes plus the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes including Economics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any other Social Science subject

title: BUSINESS EDUCATION
de_requirements: Two (2)‘A’ Level passes or NCE merit in Business Education Double Major, ANBC of NABTEB, National Diploma in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) TCII merit, ‘O’ Level or NBC (NABTEB), WASC, GCE, NECO, or its approved equivalents by the Federal Ministry of Education (FME) and or National Universities Commission (NUC) to include credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other subjects in the Social Sciences or Arts. For NBC, the other subjects could be from any of the following: Commerce, Office Practice, Principles of Accounts, Secretarial Duties, Typewriting, Shorthand, Salesmanship, Marketing, History, Storekeeping.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics plus one (1) of Literature in English, History, Government, Geography, Chemistry and Physics.

title: CHRISTIAN STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes/NCE/ to include CRS.  DIP.RS/DIP TH. from Recognised Universities/Theological Colleges/Seminaries. Also, to include Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, CRS and three (3) other subjects from Arts, Social Sciences or Sciences
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, CRS and three (3) other subjects from Arts, Social Sciences or Sciences
subjects: Two (2) Arts subjects including CRS and any other subject.

title: CIVIL ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
In addition to Five (5) SSC credit passes at not
more than two sittings requirement, the Candidate should possess one of the following: i) passes from Chemistry, Physics, and Mathematics ii) ND lower credit in Civil Engineering for admission into 200 level.


iii) HND lower credit in Civil Engineering for admission into 300 level.


iv) Students may be allowed to transfer into 200 or 300 level provided:
- they satisfy the University Conditions for transfer.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes at not more than one sittings to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and one other relevant Science Subject from Biology, Agricultural Science, Technical Drawing, Further Mathematics, etc. in the SSCE or its approved equivalent by Federal Ministry of Education. The candidate must have an acceptable pass mark in the UTME.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics

title: COMPUTER ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
In addition to Five (5) SSC credit passes at not more than two sittings requirement, the Candidate should possess one of the following:


i) Two (2) A' Level passes from Chemistry, Physics, and Mathematics


ii) ND lower credit in Computer Engineering for admission into 200 level.


iii) HND lower credit in Computer Engineering for admission into 300 level.


iv) Students may be allowed to transfer into 200 or 300 level provided:

- they satisfy the University Conditions for transfer.
- vacancies exist in the Department
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes at not more than two sittings to include
Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and one other relevant Science subject from Biology, Agricultural Science, Computer Science, Data Processing, etc. in the SSCE or its approved equivalent by Federal Ministry of Education.
The candidate must have an acceptable pass mark in the UTME.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements:
)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes in science subjects including Mathematics

 

(ii)   NCE merit in Mathematics and one (1) other Science or Social Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics plus two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry, Agric Science, Economics and Geography.

title: ECONOMICS
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes in Economics and any one of Mathematics, Statistics, Geography, Physics, Chemistry, Agricultural Science, Accounting, Business Management, History and Government.
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two (2) of Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and any of Government, History, Geography, Literature in English, French and Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies.

title: EDUCATION & COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes including Physics or Chemistry.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes or its equivalents including Mathematics, English Language and three (3) other Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one of Biology, Chemistry and Geography.

title: EDUCATION & ECONOMICS
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Economics and one (1) other relevant subject.

(ii) NCE merit/credit in Economics and one (1) other subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language, Economics and Mathematics.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and one (1) other subject from Geography/Physics, History, Government and Literature in English.

title: EDUCATION & ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant teaching subjects including Literature in English.


(ii)  NCE credit or merit in two(2)relevant subjects including English Language.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Literature in English plus three (3) other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and one (1) Art and any other subject.

title: ELECTRICAL/ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
In addition to Five (5) SSC credit passes at not more than two sittings requirement, the Candidate should possess one of the following:
i) Two (2) A' Level passes from Chemistry, Physics, and
Mathematics
ii) ND lower credit in Electrical and Electronics Engineering for admission into 200
level.
iii) HND lower credit in Electrical and Electronics Engineering for admission into 300
level.
iv) Students may be allowed to transfer into 200 or 300 level provided:
- they satisfy the University Conditions for transfer.
- vacancies exist in the Department
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes at not more than two sittings to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and one other relevant Science subject from Biology, Agricultural Science, Computer Science, Data Processing, Further Mathematics, etc. in the SSCE or its approved equivalent by Federal Ministry of Education.
The candidate must have an acceptable pass mark in the UTME.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry

title: ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Literature in English and one other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Literature in English, English Language and three other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English, one other Arts subject and another Arts or Social Science subject.

title: ENTREPRENEURSHIP
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes to include Economics and at least one of, Accounts, Business Management, Government, Geography or Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Economics, one Science subject and one other Social Science or Commercial subject.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and one other Social Science or Commercial subject.

title: ESTATE MANAGEMENT
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Economics and one (1) other relevant subject from English Langiuage, Mathematics, Geography, Biology, Technical Drawing, and Physics.   

(ii) ND/HND Lower Credit in Estate Management or allied professions
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes including  English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two subjects from the following; Chemistry, Physics, Geography, Biology, Agricultural Science, Technical Drawing, Commerce and Computer Education, one of which must be a science subject.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and one other subject

title: GEOLOGY
de_requirements: (i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Geology, Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics, Biology and Geography.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other subject.
subjects: Any three (3) of Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics, Biology and Geography.

title: GUIDANCE & COUNSELLING
de_requirements: General Certificate of Education at Advanced Level in at least two teaching subjects or NCE with two-teaching subjects, in addition to five ‘O’ Level credits, including English and Mathematics as required for UTME candidates. Candidates with double teaching subjects (e.g.  Agricultural Science, PHE, Fine Arts, Home Economics, Business Education, Primary Education etc.) in NCE with the required ‘O’ level subjects are also eligible for Direct Entry.
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ Level credits in English and Mathematics plus any three Arts, Social Science or Science subjects in WASC, GCE, NECO or its approved equivalents by Federal Ministry of Education (FME) and orNational Universities Commission (NUC)
subjects: Any three (3) subjects.

title: HISTORY & INTERNATIONAL STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) A Level passes including History/ Government, Religious Studies, Literature in English, Economics, Geogrphy, Yoruba, Igbo, Hausa
utme_requirements: English Language, History and/or Government Any One orTwo of the following Subjects; Religious Studies, Literature in English, Civic Education, Geography,Economics,Yoruba, Igbo/Hausa
subjects: subjects from the Arts and Social Sciences.

title: INDUSTRIAL CHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
(i)    Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and Mathematics

(ii)   ND in Science Technology or ND in relevant programmes with the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics and Biology/Agricultural Science.
subjects: Chemistry, Physics and any of Mathematics/Biology/ Agricultural Science.

title: INDUSTRIAL RELATIONS & PERSONNEL MANAGEMENT
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Economics, Accounting, Business Management, Government, Geography and Statistics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics plus any two (2) subjects listed under the Direct Entry column.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and one other subject.

title: LAW
de_requirements:
Two (2)'A' Level passes in Arts or Social Science subjects.

(ii)   NCE/ND/First Degree (Second Class Lower).
utme_requirements: Five (5)'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Literature in English.
subjects: Any three (3) Arts or Social Science subjects.

title: LIBRARY & INFORMATION SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in relevant subjects.

 

(ii) NCE/ND credit or merit in relevant Arts, Social Science and Science programmes.
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ Level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics plus three (3) relevant subjects from Arts, Social Sciences and Sciences in WASC/GCE/NABTEB/NECO.
subjects: Any three (3) Arts or Social Science subjects

title: MASS COMMUNICATION
de_requirements: (1.) Diploma in Mass Communication, Journalism & Related disciplines ( 2) Passes in 2 major subjects in relevant areas in NCE.
utme_requirements: Credit Passes in : - Mathematics,  English language & three other Arts or Social Science subjects in not more than two sittings
subjects: Any three (3) Arts and Social Science subjects.

title: MATHEMATICS
de_requirements: Candidates seeking admission via Direct Entry must have a minimum of two (2) Advanced Level passes in Mathematics and any other of Physics, Chemistry, Economics, Geography, and other Science and Social Science related fields. The results must be obtained from a recognized Advanced Level qualification institution (IJMB, JUPEB, Monotechnic, Polytechnic and College of Education). The qualifications are in addition to the UTME requirement above.
utme_requirements: (5) O’level credits in Mathematics, English Language, and any other three subjects among Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Further Mathematics, Technical Drawing, Agricultural Science, Geography and Economics. The credits must be obtained in no more than 2 sittings.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Economics or Geography.

title: MECHANICAL ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
In addition to Five (5) SSC credit passes at not more than two sittings requirement, the Candidate should possess one of the following: Three (3) A' Level passes from Chemistry, Physics, and Mathematics
ii) ND lower credit in mechanical Engineering for admission into 200 level.
iii) HND in Mechanical Engineering for admission into 300 level.
iv) Students may be allowed to transfer into 200 or 300 level provided:
- they satisfy the University Conditions for transfer.
- vacancies exist in the Department
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes at not more than two sittings to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and one other relevant Science subject from Biology, Agricultural Science, Technical Drawing, Further Mathematics, Metal Work, etc. in the
SSCE or its approved equivalent by Federal Ministry of Education.
The candidate must have an acceptable pass mark in the UTME.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: MEDICAL LABORATORY SCIENCE
de_requirements:
A' Level passes to include Physics, Chemistry & Biology or Zoology.


Upper Credit, Medical Laboratory Technician.


Any degree in Science/Medical Science related courses.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology

title: MICROBIOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology and any one (1) from Chemistry, Zoology or Botany. ND/HND in related disciplines with atleast Lower Credit passes plus UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and either Physics or Mathematics.

title: MUSIC
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Music or Diploma Certificate in Music, or NCE in Music, or MUSON Diploma in Music or Diploma in other arts, social sciences and sciences.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE/NECO/NABTEB credit passes including  English Language and any other four Subjects, from Arts, Social Sciences and Sciences.
subjects: Music, one other Arts subject plus any other subject.

title: PEACE, STRATEGIC & CONFLICT RESOLUTION
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Government and one other Social Science subject
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes  including English Language Government or History and at least credit pass in Mathematics
subjects: Three (3) Arts or Social Science subjects

title: PERFORMING ARTS
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Arts to include Literature in English, Social Sciences or Science subjects. Other direct entry requirements include:  NCE/Diploma in Theatre Arts, Perfoming Arts, Dramatic Arts, Creatie Arts and other related fields in Humanities or Social Sciences.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE/NECO/NABTEB credit passes to include English Language, Literature in English and any other three subjects  in Arts, Social Sciences or Sciences.
subjects: Literature in English and two (2) other relevant subjects.

title: PHYSICS WITH ELECTRONICS
de_requirements: NCE/Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics or Chemistry.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other Science subject from Further Mathematics and Biology or Agricultural Science.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry or Biology.

title: POLITICAL SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes including Government or History.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Government or History, English Language and three (3) other subjects.  A Credit pass in Mathematics is required.
subjects: Government or History plus two (2) other Social Science/Arts subjects.

title: RADIOGRAPHY & RADIATION SCIENCE
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Physics, Chemistry and Biology.


Any degree in science/Medical Science related courses.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Physics and Chemistry.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: STATISTICS
de_requirements: Candidates seeking admission via Direct Entry must have a minimum of two (2) Advanced Level passes in Mathematics and any other of Physics, Chemistry, Economics, Geography, and other Science and Social Science related fields. The results must be obtained from a recognized Advanced Level qualification institution (IJMB, JUPEB, Monotechnic, Polytechnic and College of Education). The qualifications are in addition to the UTME requirement above.
utme_requirements: Candidates seeking admissions via UTME must have a minimum of five (5) O’level credits in Mathematics, English Language, and any other three subjects among Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Further Mathematics, Technical Drawing, Agricultural Science, Geography and Economics. The credits must be obtained in no more than 2 sittings.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Economics.

title: SURVEYING & GEOINFORMATICS
de_requirements: Admission to Part II (Direct Entry I-200L) 1. Candidates who have pases in Mathematices and Physics or Mathematics and Geography at the G.C.E. Advanced Level or its equivalent, and also satisfy the minimum entry requirements for part I. 2. Holders of the National Diploma (ND) in Surveying/Surveying and Geoinformatics, Civil Engineering, Building and Agricultural Engineering passing at the minimum of Upper Credit level, from a NBTE accredited Institution. They must also satisfy the minimum entry requirments for part I. Candidates admitted by direct entry may be required, where applicable, to take specified courses to make up for the deficiencies found in their academic background.Admission to Part III (Direct Entry II-300L) 1. Holders of Higher National Diploma (HND) in Surveying/Surveying and Geoinformatics passing at the minimum of Upper Credit level, from an NBTE accredited Institution. They must also satisfy the minimum entry requiremnts for Part I.
utme_requirements: Holders of Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSSC) or its equivalent with five credits including English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry/Geography and any other subject selected from Economics, Biology, Further Mathematics and Technical Drawing at not more than two sittings.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics, and any of Chemistry, Geography, Art, Biology and Economics.

title: TEACHER EDUCATION SCIENCE:
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant teaching subjects including Literature in English.

(ii)  NCE credit or merit in two(2)relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Literature in English plus three (3) other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and one (1) Art and any other subject.
